apifyStorageId.title: Apify Storage ID
apifyStorageId.description: Id of dataset or key value store where the data are located.

recordKey.title: Record Key
recordKey.description: Only specify if Apify storage id points to a key value store! This is the record key under which the data are.

rawData.title: Raw Data
rawData.description: Raw JSON array you want to check.

functionalChecker.title: Functional Checker
functionalChecker.description: Objects with item fields as keys and values as predicates (functions that return true/false)

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: How many items will be checked. Default is all

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: From which item the checking will start. Use with limit to check specific items.

bachSize.title: Max concurrency
bachSize.description: You can specify how many maximum parallel downloading/uploading requests will be running. Keep in mind that the limit is here to not overload the host server.
